title: Codem Study Hub: Major Update Released
excerpt: Just released a major update to Codem Study Hub with new features including spaced repetition and note filtering.
author: Codem
content:
What's New in Codem Study Hub

I'm excited to announce a major update to Codem Study Hub! This release includes several new features that I've been working on for the past few months.

Spaced Repetition System

The new spaced repetition algorithm helps you study more efficiently by showing you flashcards at optimal intervals based on your performance.

Filtered Revision Notes

You can now filter and download revision notes based on specific topics or difficulty levels, making it easier to focus on what you need to study.

Improved UI

The interface has been completely redesigned for better usability and a more modern look.

Check it out at codem-studyset.vercel.app!
